_meanings:
{@--6@} An adjunct of a thing, a 

secondary member ({#muKyAnuyAyi, apraDAnaM#}); a
secondary symptom, symptomatic
affection, attendant on the 
principal disease ({#vAtapittAdidozARAmaprADAnyaM#});
{#mUrCAnubaMDA vizamajvarAH#} <ls>Suśr.</ls>

{@--8@} (Gram.)
An indicatory syllable or letter 
intended to denote some peculiarity in
the inflection, accent &c. of the
word to which it is attached; as the
{#x#} in {#gamx, R#} in {#iR#}; {#ripurApa parABavAya#} 
{#maDyaM prakftipratyayayorivAnubaMDaH#} <ls>Ki. 13. 19.</ls>

{@--10@} An obstacle,
impediment; also the clog or 
encumbrance of a family; domestic
ties or attachment.

{@--11@} A child or
pupil who follows the example set
by his parent or teacher ({#muKyAnuyAyI#}
{#SiSuH#}).

{@--13@} Repeated application or
devotion ({#pOnaH punyena aBiniveSa#}).

{@--15@} A small bit or
part, a trifle.

{@--16@} The junction of a
fraction (with an integer), as  
{#BAgAmubaMDapUrRAkaH#}.
